name: Mind Sensus
description:
How quickly can they recognize colors, shapes and patterns? You understand the game principle right away, but can you master it?

Mind Sensus presents you with a fun but challenging task that only the best minds can master, while you also train your brain.

Mind Sensus offers a lot of fun and a dose of cognitive training. Who knows ... soon you will switch to the master mode and become a true master of recognition and brain-training.

Initially only three different cards are available, but if you become better and achieve higher points you will unlock more cards with new patterns, colors and shapes. You can also unlock higher play modes.

Developed by the creator of Magic Alchemist!
